title: Kelly958
author: Kelly958
content: Dex and liquidity providers are the two main ingredients of oscar swap. Both of them are crucial for the growth of crypto ecosystem. Through liquidity provider we can stabliize the price, increase trading volume and much more. New tokens can accessed by general public. All of these elements could be observed in oscar swap. In oscar swap token are being given as an incentive for more participation in liquidity pool. Deposited tokens can be withdrawn by users at any time, allowing them to earn rewards while maintaining flexibility over their funds. Attractive rewards are being provided with less fee. What else do you want crypto freaks??

comments.author: @sriyan
comments.body: Quote from: Kelly958 on April 28, 2023, 11:32:02 AMDex and liquidity providers are the two main ingredients of oscar swap. Both of them are crucial for the growth of crypto ecosystem. Through liquidity provider we can stabliize the price, increase trading volume and much more. New tokens can accessed by general public. All of these elements could be observed in oscar swap. In oscar swap token are being given as an incentive for more participation in liquidity pool. Deposited tokens can be withdrawn by users at any time, allowing them to earn rewards while maintaining flexibility over their funds. Attractive rewards are being provided with less fee. What else do you want crypto freaks??I think the institutional investors control the market.  Most of the DEX is supported mentioned features. The main points are the volume of the market and the news.

comments.author: masulum
comments.body: Liquidity providers do not guarantee price stability, they only help provide a balance so that tokens can still be sold. Project will have more liquidity providers if the rewards for them is worth enough to run. However, it is also a threat to providers if in the end the token they choose does not get enthusiasm from the community and the DEX doesn't have good volume. Some questgion for you,- How many services offer partnerships to reward liquidity providers when staking there? If there is no difference, maybe choosing to choose the liquidity of existing projects in CEX will be prioritized or in other DEX that have good volume so they feel save to provide a liquidity for his supported project.- I see Oscar Swap is a DEX on the Arbitrum network, but from the web they don't include their social media or even I don't see their open source code in github. Is this save to use?- Are you part of Oscar Swap team?

comments.author: JeffBrad12
comments.body: Quote from: masulum on April 28, 2023, 03:01:43 PMI don't see their open source code in github. Is this save to use?well that's redflag right there I think proper swap platform should always have their code up in github and seeing that there are quite many malicious contract for stealing people money i'd be alerted if using this swap platform.honestly all the points you mentioned all are all important point that the swap platform should be made clear, I wonder if metamask actually gonna show warning in their wallet since their recent updates has about to bring such feature.

comments.author: poodle63
comments.body: Quote from: @sriyan on April 28, 2023, 02:47:19 PMI think the institutional investors control the market.  Most of the DEX is supported mentioned features. The main points are the volume of the market and the news. I don't even think so but if it's the whales and i would say yes. The institutional investors are always using the retail investors as exit liquidity. The liq providers have been contributing a lot by giving liquidity for others to exit. The volume was coming from the liq provider. As long as the new token get liq providers and others will trust it as a trusted tokens that can be traded.

comments.author: ice18
comments.body: Quote from: Kelly958 on April 28, 2023, 11:32:02 AMDex and liquidity providers are the two main ingredients of oscar swap. Both of them are crucial for the growth of crypto ecosystem. Through liquidity provider we can stabliize the price, increase trading volume and much more. New tokens can accessed by general public. All of these elements could be observed in oscar swap. In oscar swap token are being given as an incentive for more participation in liquidity pool. Deposited tokens can be withdrawn by users at any time, allowing them to earn rewards while maintaining flexibility over their funds. Attractive rewards are being provided with less fee. What else do you want crypto freaks??Most DEX have already this features LP incentives/  token rewards but this is not for long term most LPs dump reward token making the price crash and small LP suffers, I dont think rewarding tokens to LP is a good idea, if you have a mechanism to make the price of the token rewards maintain its value then is good but if not its hard to attract LPs in a newly bulit DEx like Oscar swap.

comments.author: Andrija Branislav
comments.body: Quote from: Kelly958 on April 28, 2023, 11:32:02 AMDex and liquidity providers are the two main ingredients of oscar swap. Both of them are crucial for the growth of crypto ecosystem. Through liquidity provider we can stabliize the price, increase trading volume and much more. New tokens can accessed by general public. All of these elements could be observed in oscar swap. In oscar swap token are being given as an incentive for more participation in liquidity pool. Deposited tokens can be withdrawn by users at any time, allowing them to earn rewards while maintaining flexibility over their funds. Attractive rewards are being provided with less fee. What else do you want crypto freaks??I agree that liquidity providers are the main driving force behind the growth of the crypto market. Without them, trading volume would be limited, and cryptocurrency prices would experience extreme volatility.Quote from: @sriyan on April 28, 2023, 02:47:19 PMI think the institutional investors control the market.  Most of the DEX is supported mentioned features. The main points are the volume of the market and the news. Institutional investors do have a significant impact on the market due to their large capital, market expertise and influence. However, the decentralized nature of DEXs allows for more accessible and transparent trading, which attracts individual investors. Market volume and news can also greatly influence market movements, leading to price fluctuations. Therefore I think it is also important to follow market trends and news updates to make the right investment decision.

comments.author: slashz9
comments.body: Oscar Swap's ability to offer attractive rewards with lower fees can make it a more appealing choice for users compared to other DEX platforms. The flexibility to withdraw deposited tokens at any time can also be a valuable feature for users who want to maintain control over their funds.

comments.author: Bitstar_coin
comments.body: Quote from: slashz9 on April 29, 2023, 11:37:24 AMOscar Swap's ability to offer attractive rewards with lower fees can make it a more appealing choice for users compared to other DEX platforms. The flexibility to withdraw deposited tokens at any time can also be a valuable feature for users who want to maintain control over their funds.Tell me which Dex that does not have the qualities that you mentioned here?I think basically most dex also provide attractive rewards and ability to withdraw your deposit at anytime you so desire. What will not be appealing to users is the fact Oscar swap is relatively new, nowadays there are many cases of rug pull by many unknown dex and also the case of hack (mostly staged imo).Well, there is always room for benefit of doubt and improvement but I think most users only prefer what the majority trust.

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: Quote from: Bitstar_coin on April 29, 2023, 12:31:04 PMQuote from: slashz9 on April 29, 2023, 11:37:24 AMOscar Swap's ability to offer attractive rewards with lower fees can make it a more appealing choice for users compared to other DEX platforms. The flexibility to withdraw deposited tokens at any time can also be a valuable feature for users who want to maintain control over their funds.Tell me which Dex that does not have the qualities that you mentioned here?I think basically most dex also provide attractive rewards and ability to withdraw your deposit at anytime you so desire. What will not be appealing to users is the fact Oscar swap is relatively new, nowadays there are many cases of rug pull by many unknown dex and also the case of hack (mostly staged imo).Well, there is always room for benefit of doubt and improvement but I think most users only prefer what the majority trust.Yeah, pretty much generic features without innovation. It's like selling brand a brand new cryptocurrency with gimmicks like it has an immutable blockchain and it's secure and decentralized. Name does not make sense unless i am missing some meme here and selling having a dex on arbitrum layer seems also pretty weak considering that everyone else including uniswap have offered that for a long time now.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Quote from: Kelly958 on April 28, 2023, 11:32:02 AMDex and liquidity providers are the two main ingredients of oscar swap. Both of them are crucial for the growth of crypto ecosystem. Through liquidity provider we can stabliize the price, increase trading volume and much more. New tokens can accessed by general public. All of these elements could be observed in oscar swap. In oscar swap token are being given as an incentive for more participation in the liquidity pool. Deposited tokens can be withdrawn by users at any time, allowing them to earn rewards while maintaining flexibility over their funds. Attractive rewards are being provided with less fee. What else do you want crypto freaks??This will all end in some pumped projects, because liquidity providers may cash out on the real investor, so this will not give small cryptocurrency investors any opportunities to make profits and the percentage of both losses and gains is high. The small investors have a high chance of losing their investment in this class of market scheme.Of what use is a token to the crypto ecosystems is it does not provide a use case that solves real-time problems, those have been the major challenges of the new token developers and why there is now high demand for liquidity providers who are big bag holders and can manipulate the market

comments.author: livingfree
comments.body: Quote from: Kelly958 on April 28, 2023, 11:32:02 AMDex and liquidity providers are the two main ingredients of oscar swap. Both of them are crucial for the growth of crypto ecosystem. Through liquidity provider we can stabliize the price, increase trading volume and much more. New tokens can accessed by general public. All of these elements could be observed in oscar swap. In oscar swap token are being given as an incentive for more participation in liquidity pool. Deposited tokens can be withdrawn by users at any time, allowing them to earn rewards while maintaining flexibility over their funds. Attractive rewards are being provided with less fee. What else do you want crypto freaks??These are common to the other swaps that I've seen. I think there's really nothing new to what you've said and the new ones on this space might be too optimistic with those features you've mentioned.It's not that every swap that has such good features as these becomes successful. Those that are quite early were the ones to gain the traction and followed by those next to it.And then those that are quite late, they're likely the ones that don't get massive success unlike those that have been the first ones.

The main points are the volume of the market and the news. I think there is a link as well Overall but related to Liquidity providers to drive market to higher level as the topic the OP said also plays a role where liquidity providers play an important role in driving the growth and adoption of decentralized finance (DeFi) and the wider cryptocurrency ecosystem by providing adequate liquidity necessary for the DEX to function effectively.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Many platforms believe that whenever you offer a higher return to deposit the liquidity for users, they will keep their money, but as soon as the profits decrease, you will have to reduce the return, and then you will find that more started to withdraw his money.The good decentralized platform accommodates its reputation and the mechanism of its work with a low return, but it is sustainable. Here you will find that many are starting to firm in the platform and ready to provide liquidity for a return of 4% per month.Are you from the developed team and can you explain the advantages of oscar swap?

comments.author: yazher
comments.body: If this kind of feature existed for the last 3 years, this would have been the trend in the Dex exchanges because right now, people seem to trust more centralized exchanges that carefully check every coin and token listed on their businesses. Maybe if there are no more good choices anymore from the lists of centralized exchanges, people will probably switch to using Dex exchanges more often again just like before and when they do that, this time they will be amazed because of its improvement and convenience just like what the OP said.

comments.author: Rampagoe004
comments.body: They offer attractive rewards and they have low fees. I think that's an interesting thing. But my question is which DEX doesn't have what Oscar Swap has? I think that is normal for DEX. I've seen them on instagram and I think they've done their job as a "DEX for anyone". Maybe you can mention good things about them apart from their attractive oscar swap and reward capabilities?
